document_analyses.text: This is a sample document chunk for testing purposes. It mentions Lee Harvey Oswald as the alleged assassin of President John F. Kennedy. The Warren Commission concluded that Oswald acted alone, but controversy has surrounded this conclusion for decades.

document_analyses.text: Jack Ruby shot and killed Oswald on November 24, 1963, while Oswald was being transferred from the city jail to the county jail. The shooting was captured on live television, fueling speculation about a possible conspiracy and coverup.
